name: Death Sentence
desc:
🦆 Tweet this attempt to appear in credits.
✋ Grab the soul to start another adventure.

name: Restless Dream
desc:
The hero is wandering an endless road.
Continue ahead using 👣 Walk.

name: Internal Demon
desc:
🌀 Roll or 🔰 Block to avoid getting hit.
Enemies spend 🟢 Energy to attack.

name: Dream Shrimp
desc:
🖐 Grab any helpful items along the way.
💤 Rest to regain 🟢 Energy and 🔵 Mana.

name: Shaping Decision
desc:
Choose a character perk to shape the skills.
Some may come with a sacrifice.

name: Silent Grove
desc:
Nothing but endless trees all around.
👣 Walk to explore further ahead.

name: Startled Crow
desc:
The crow appears to be going for the eyes.
Quickly cover before the impact.

name: Suspicious Boulder
desc:
Just a piece of rock laying on the ground.
No reason to bother stopping here.

name: Raving Earthworm
desc:
The poor thing has a sunlight shock.
Looks like it got a burst of energy.

name: Rabid Raccoon
desc:
Cute on the first glance.
Ferocious on the second.

name: Fern Glade
desc:
This looks like a nice place to rest.
Perhaps make use of it.

name: Frantic Deer
desc:
Its majestic antlers look rather deadly.
Better not underestimate it.

name: Abandoned Tent
desc:
Cozy place of rest for whoever set it up.
Chance to loot for someone else.

name: Lost Map
desc:
Stumbled upon an unknown map.
There are notes around the edges.

name: Roasted Chicken
desc:
It is still hot and untouched.
Who would leave it like that?

name: Disturbed Druid
desc:
Noticed suspicious activity in their camp.
\"Never should have come here!\"

name: Pine Grove
desc:
Another bunch of trees in the forest.
A chance to catch a breath.

name: Engaging Owl
desc:
Stares ahead without blinking an eye.
Almost feels like about to speak.

name: Stray Dog
desc:
The creature looks kind of aggressive.
But its eyes say otherwise.

name: Deserted Church
desc:
Eerie atmosphere is in the air.
Better not stick around.

name: Mangy Bear
desc:
It appears to be very upset.
Beware its mighty attack.

name: Eternal Flame
desc:
Calming aura radiates all around.
Chance for a breather.

name: Dire Rat
desc:
It jumped out of nowhere really fast.
Better raise the shield.

name: Megalithic Statue
desc:
A giant stone facing the heavens.
Must be thousands years old.

name: Worried Crow
desc:
Another crow appeared from somewhere.
Seems to be looking for its mate.

name: Leather Pouch
desc:
The pouch was covered by the blanket.
Looks like there's something inside.

name: Sharp Knife
desc:
The owner could be nearby.
I'd rather not mess with it.

name: Honey Badger
desc:
The creature boasts sinister energy.
Better to not underestimate.

name: Sweet Honeypot
desc:
Seems like a fine refreshment.
The lid is trembling though.
message: The honeypot was full of bees.

name: Swarm of Bees
desc:
The bees instantly swarmed the area.
There's nowhere to run

name: Alpha Boar
desc:
Loud stomps follow its steps.
Must weight a ton.

name: Boar Meat
desc:
Still all warm and bloody.
Sadly there's no fire around.
message: Got sick of the raw meat

name: Abandoned House
desc:
This house has been long neglected.
Maybe there's something valuable left?

name: Empty Jar
desc:
Appears to be clean and empty.
Might come in handy later.
message: A cold breeze escaped the jar

name: Suspicious Mushroom
desc:
Fruiting body of an unrecognisable species.
Could it be poisonous?

name: Psychotic Episode
desc:
Cannot tell up either up from down.
Nor left from right.

name: Forest Skunk
desc:
Seems having lightning reflexes.
Fight or flight.

name: Overgrown Reeds
desc:
This seems like the only way forward.
But anything could be hiding there.

name: Frog-faced Giant
desc:
Foul stench reeks from it's mouth.
Bloodshot eyes blink slowly.

name: Wavy Pond
desc:
The water has a strange glow.
Something sparkles at the bottom.

name: Shiny Trinket
desc:
The surface has a pearlescent finish.
A bit warm on touch.

name: Tulip Glade
desc:
There are tulips literally everywhere.
Why don't not pick some?

name: Rainbow Unicorn
desc:
Strange horse approached.
Intentions are unclear.

name: Eternal Flame
desc:
Calming aura radiates all around.
Chance for a breather.

name: Irritable Goat
desc:
It looks bursting with anger.
Better avoid it's attacks.

name: Rose Flower Bush
desc:
These are just beautiful.
Perhaps grab some.

name: Cunning Fox
desc:
Sits around waving its furry tail.
Perhaps it's up to something.

name: Familiar Plant
desc:
Probably packs a ton of nutrients.
Give it a shot?
message: Dug it out of the ground.

name: Wild Carrot
desc:
A carrot was hiding below the ground.
This seems like a time for a snack.

name: Mighty Deer
desc:
Huge deer jumped out of the bush.
Better be very careful.

name: Apple Tree
desc:
A fruit tree in a forest.
Who would have thought.

name: Ripe Apple
desc:
Looks all shiny and tasty.
May recover some health.

name: Practice Target
desc:
There isn't a scratch on it.
Someone hanged it but never used it.

name: Radiating Bow
desc:
Lays beside a dead hunter.
Probably won't miss it.
message: Shot an arrow in the knee

name: Agitated Bull
desc:
Looks fairly angry over something.
Better avoid the horns.

name: Four-leaf Clover
desc:
Fairly interesting growth.
Maybe brings luck.

name: Simple Hut
desc:
Whoever lived here seems have left.
What if the left something behind?

name: Suspicious Idol
desc:
Unfamiliar peace of ancient art.
Might come in handy.

name: Picnic Basket
desc:
Someone must have lost it here.
Maybe there is still something inside

name: Cinnamon Cookie
desc:
Smells absolutely amazing.
Likely packs a burst of energy.

name: Steaming Pile
desc:
Looks like somethings shining in it.
Not sure if it's worth it.

name: Engraved Ring
desc:
It says "My Precious" on the inside.
That sounds promising.
message: Ouch! The ring is too tight

name: Old Wolf
desc:
Walking in circles slowly.
Hopefully not too hungry.

name: Cavern Entrance
desc:
Huge crack leading inside the mountain.
Faint light is coming out.

name: Eternal Flame
team:
Calming aura radiates all around.
Chance for a breather.

name: Invisible Creature
desc:
Something is crawling around.
It seems to be fast as a wind.

name: Pile of Bones
desc:
Mound built of someone's remains.
Doesn't look like an accident.

name: Ghastly Wolf
desc:
Winding up for a powerful attack.
Better avoid it.

name: Pile of Skulls
desc:
Adventures seem to usually end here.
Better stay alert.

name: Golden Trinket
desc:
Forcefully draws the eyesight.
Almost irresistible.
message: It got stuck to the skin

name: Invisible Creature
desc:
Something is crawling around again.
What is happening here?

name: Tired Old Man
desc:
The silhouette changed to a human.
They are willing to enchant you.

name: Ancient Scroll
desc:
Some say these make you blind.
Only one way to find out.

name: Unknown Potion
desc:
It is glowing in the dark.
Probably shouldn't risk it.
message: Left a funny taste in the mouth

name: Enormous Snake
desc:
It perfectly blends with the surroundings.
Almost stumbled over it.

name: Snake Egg
desc:
Beautiful texture wraps around it.
You only live once.

name: Strange Door
desc:
Ornate door shimmering at the back wall.
Where could it lead to?

name: Giant Web
desc:
Hopefully nobody's home.
It seems quite sturdy.

name: Eight-legged Menace
desc:
It looks like it was waiting for a prey.
There is no turning back now.

name: Eternal Flame
team:
Calming aura radiates all around.
Chance for a breather.

name: Faded Amphora
desc:
Strangely warm on touch.
Something quivers inside.

name: Evil Genie
desc:
\"How dare you disturb me?
Prepare to die!\""

name: Screaming Bat
desc:
Screams echo around the crypt.
Goosebumps.

name: Desolate Gave
desc:
The text is all faded.
Something is on the ground.

name: Engagement Ring
desc:
It could still warm someone's heart.
Or at least fill their pocket.
message: Felt a surge in your chest

name: Burial Coffin
desc:
Looks someone tampered with it recently.
There are fingerprints all over.

name: Animated Dead
desc:
It surely carries lot of diseases.
Better keep distance.

name: Spooky Spirit
desc:
A ghost appeared out of nowhere.
A little bit scary in this darkness.
message: The spirit cannot be physically hit

name: Old Potato
desc:
It looks suspiciously too fresh.
Maybe it was brought here recently.

name: Thirsty Vampire
desc:
It seems to have just awoken.
Better avoid its fangs.

name: The Scales of Honor
desc:
Resembles the mythical legend.
Stay alert.

name: Massive Dragon
desc:
Is this the final challenge?
Take it down!

name: King's Crown
desc:
This is where it ends for now.
Tweet this to appear in credits!
